Description

A command class having the logic of the command endSession.

A command class having the logic of the command resetServer.

A command class having the logic of the command setDefaultNumberOfLives.

A command class having the logic of the command startSession.

A command class having the logic of the command writeChanges.
DatabaseHandler
A class that interacts with the plugin's database.
MhlCommand
An abstract class serving as a template to every command of the plugin.
MhlController
The plugin's controller.
MultipleHardcoreLives
The main class of the plugin.
Player
A model storing the data of a player for the server it's currently in.
PlayerListener
Listens to every useful event related to player and sends it to its controller.
Server
A model that stores data about the server and its players.
SessionManager
A class that contains the logic of the plugin for its sessions.
